verses.name: Psalms 42:5
verses.text: Why art thou cast down, O my soul? and why art thou disquieted in me? hope thou in God: for I shall yet praise him for the help of his countenance.

verses.name: Psalms 42:6
verses.text: O my God, my soul is cast down within me: therefore will I remember thee from the land of Jordan, and of the Hermonites, from the hill Mizar.

verses.name: Psalms 42:7
verses.text: Deep calleth unto deep at the noise of thy waterspouts: all thy waves and thy billows are gone over me.
